question_list.question: What societal causes do you think need the most support?
question_list.description:
Please express your opinion using Quadratic Voting as described above. You have a total of 36 credits for the following 9 causes. You do not need to use up all the credits, but you cannot exceed 36 credits.

If you think that more resources should be allocated to a certain cause, you can cast upvotes for that cause. If you believe that fewer resources should be allocated on a certain cause, you can cast downvotes for that option.
